entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert.ToDateTime reports that the error was not handled by the user when using the handler #81622
  • Failed to read NuGet.Config due to unauthorized access. #81619
  • XmlSerializer: provide more details in error message "Compiling JScript/CSharp scripts is not supported" #81613
  • [Mono] An assertion that Android hit when using LLVM 14 with AOT #81610
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Vector128.ShuffleUnsafe #81609
    8.0.0
  • Unable to sign StandardOptimizationData.mibc #81601
  • Missing copyright header in some runtime binaries #81600
  • Arm VectorTableLookup and VectorTableExtension - Part 2 #81599
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient on .NET 7 does not pass windows credentials to endpoint #81595
    8.0.0
  • IHttpClientFactory change HttpClientHandler credentials #81594
  • .net core runtime does not load two version of same assembly #81593
  • [NativeAOT] Usages of generic `EqualityComparer.Default` have cctor init checks for primitives #81592
    Future
  • Inconsistent behavior in `SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient` across win/linux #81590
    8.0.0
  • Unhandled exception inside Interop+OpenSsl.AlpnServerSelectCallback causing the process crash #81588
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.UpgradeToGeneratedRegexAnalyzerTests.NoDiagnosticsForNet60(invocationType: StaticMethods) #81586
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Vector4Tests.Vector4DistanceTest1 #81585
  • NativeAot publish fail #81584
  • Adding `global.json` version is causing `dotnet` to not run tool on linux when not using `tool run` #81580

Closed

  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check for anonymous authentication #78459
    8.0.0
  • HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args are not respected if DisableDefaults=true #81445
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!tree->IsUnusedValue() || (dstCount != 0)' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #81356
  • SslStream_NegotiateClientCertificateAsyncTls13_Succeeds fails on non-portable builds with OpenSSL 3.0 #81546
    8.0.0
  • JIT: build pred lists early, persist them throughout compilation #80193
    8.0.0
  • Console app wont load if AspNetCore runtime is not installed #81554
  • System.Text.Json JsonSerializer.Deserialize has no support to handle missing fields #81597
  • Support targeting iOS platforms with ILCompiler #80908
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Generate StandardOptimizationData uncompressed #81623
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: rename flowList to FlowEdge and encapsulate all fields #81621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter field op refactorings; fixes #81558 #81620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix -Wformat violations #81618
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • Upstream a few changes from the NativeAOT-LLVM branch #81616
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Linux NativeAOT debug info regression test #81612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove duplicated code #81611
    area-Debugger-mono
  • EnableAotAnalyzer by default for src libraries #81608
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger]fix side effect of the symbol server PR #81606
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: fix issue with partial comp pred list maintenance #81605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix pal tests build on osx-arm64 #81604
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make internal FrozenHashTable non-generic #81603
    area-System.Collections
  • Split Mono manifest creation into a separate subset #81598
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • add RIDs for Wolfi #81589
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • WIP: Eliminate estimation and double use emitOutputInstr() #81587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix warnings found with new analyzer CA1860: Prefer Length/Count/IsEmpty property check over Any() #81583
    area-Meta

Merged

  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check (#78459) #80636
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Respect HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args when DisableDefaults=true #81568
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Update the assert to correctly check if a tree with value has non-zero destination registers #81412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix OOM edge case in interleaved LoaderHeap #81602
    area-VM-coreclr
  • pal_ssl: include missing code for non-portable OpenSSL 3.0 build. #81596
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: revise checking for computed preds #81582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove AggressiveInlining from XxHash128.HashLength0To16 #81565
    area-System.IO
  • Use eager evaluation when configuring the JsonTypeInfo type graph. #81576
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Remove JsonMetadataServices dependency from DeserializeAsyncEnumerable #81579
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Support targeting iOS platforms with ILCompiler #81476
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not print stack trace if error reading crashReportJsonFile #81467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Do not expect quic to work on single file deployments #81581
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • CI: Update darc dependency to track emsdk manifest name change #81556
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Implement more opcodes in the jiterpreter #81575
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: remove cheap preds #81562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Suppress clang-16 warnings #81573
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Generate StandardOptimizationData uncompressed #81624
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2104346 #81359
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Prep for new diagnostic work and tests #81571
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Run nativeaot tests in helix #81439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Try to minimally light up Vector2, Vector3, Quaternion, and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use MiniDumpWriteDump to create dumps on Windows #81509
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] EXPERIMENT - Folding GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR) => GT_LCL_VAR #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable AOT to print out the list of compiled methods #81567
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Prevent tests from importing "normal" NuGet props/targets #80573
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [QUIC] Added tests to check IsSupported. #81481
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] wasi: Enable library tests on CI #81052
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • diagnostic to detect malformed format strings in lsg template message #81503
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary performance, in particular for strings #81557
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • Move all of the ref-pack generators to use the "LatestVS" Roslyn build so they don't pull in prebuilts in source-build #81561
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, dev-innerloop
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add direct pinvoke module variations #81548
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81350
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81349
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Add a simple size test #81517
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT instruction for NixOS #81485
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #81532
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update heap hard limit for large pages #81292
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #81295
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAot-LLVM: Latest merges seem to have broken publishing #2192
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] PI-related issues #2190

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable the PI smoke test for WASM #2191

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement cached interface dispatch for WASM #2184
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement more opcodes #2188
  • NativeAot-LLVM: Merge before putarg type removal PR 68748 #2187

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal] .NET Tools should default to running on the latest available Runtime #30336
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet publish fails with --output Cannot create/move a file when that file already exists #30321
  • When use `dotnet restore` before `dotnet build`? #30316

Closed

  • Setting PublishSingleFile in the project can affect output assembly type #29263
  • Visual Studio 17.4.0 Preview 4.0 or 5.0: Cannot publish console app referencing netstandard2.0 or net7.0 lib as ready-to-run or single-file #28812
  • dotnet run command not listening on https #29569
  • SiteUrlToLaunchAfterPublish does not launch after publish #29683
  • Add dotnet7 in Ubuntu 22.04 jammy repository #29069
  • dotnet publish profile silently continues even if you give an invalid publish profile path #28370
    7.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2104347 #30309
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview1] Port introducing NamedMonitor from main for fixing floating tests #30320
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139

Updated

  • Fix dotnet new -v displaying exception callstack #30292
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor allowEmptyTelemetry to use Items and support hashing #30269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Generate a call of a base class constructor if the default constructor does not exist. #30264
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #25479
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Allow `class_body`, `struct_body`, `interface_body` and `enum_body` to consist of just a `;`. #6944

Merged

  • Queue roles for follow-up discussion and decision #6946

Updated

  • Clarify restrictions for accessing captured primary constructor parameters in a readonly context. #6938

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler generates excessively long counterexamples in certain scenarios involving list-patterns #66698
    C# 12.0
  • Subsumption error is not reported in certain scenarios involving list-patterns #66697
    C# 12.0
  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoringProvider NullReferenceException #66694
  • `ctor` semantic snippet seems to break muscle memory without any valid reason #66691

Closed

  • Find references doesn't correctly work when operator && is implemented by operator & #7311
    Backlog
  • Improve SyntaxFactory for documentation comments #218
    Backlog
  • PreviewPane CalculateSize() crash if global WordWrap is true #15973
    Backlog
  • Navigate Backward does not include small cursor movements. #634
    Backlog
  • "Find references" ignores collection element initializers #22449
    Backlog
  • VB TypeInferrer missing some kinds of initializers #3075
    Backlog
  • ConvertedType of null as operand to comparison #4225
    Backlog
  • Representation of operator true invocation #4287
    Backlog
  • Please make the code for IsManagedType public #5063
    Backlog
  • When generating a method that starts with "Is" use "bool" as the return type if we can't infer anything better. #5195
    Backlog
  • False positive CS8604 in case of indirect usage of return value inside conditional expression #66693
  • Don't loop forever when trying to create a directory #8133
    Backlog
  • Perceived PERF issue in preview colorization when toggling/switching to formatting options #8294
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense shows named argument that was already passed positionally #8323
    Backlog
  • The colors of ‘Punctuation’ and ‘Brace Matching’ overlap #8335
    Backlog
  • Refactoring encapsulate field - degraded, compared with VS 2013 #9927
    Backlog
  • Improved parser recovery during typing #11817
    Backlog
  • Refactoring saves files #12209
    Backlog
  • `dotnet_sort_system_directives_first` does not generate error even if `IDE0055` severity is set to `error` #57644
    Backlog
  • Completion list should prefer variables instead of type when typing all lower-case #19465
    Backlog
  • "Convert to full property" changes the formatting of unrelated lines #29021
    Backlog
  • Cannot "Find References to Literal" on negative numbers #21111
    Backlog
  • VB static member intellisense shows conversion operators #21242
    Backlog
  • BlockSyntax capturing - cannot detect in declarations #66676
  • [CS0822] Allow function-local const-var for types which can be determined on compile-time #66687

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable MSBuild COMM log #66708
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change target branch #66707
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add API to determine what capabilities the runtime supports #66706
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix 'Generate Enum Member' to work in a 'Color Color' case. #66705
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets - don't offer rename for ctor snippet #66704
    Area-IDE
  • Support structure guides for #if directives #66702
    Area-IDE
  • Properly classify aliases in quick info #66701
    Area-IDE
  • Do not suggest replacing lambda with method group if the invoked mehod has `Conditional` attribute #66699
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EA extensibility point for F# to implement TaskList service ( TODO comments support) #66695
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Trigger merging of values even if the precondition is already met #66692
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Don't show interactive window errors in error list #66689
    Area-Interactive
  • Allow multiple handlers on the same class in ClaSP #66688
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Find bitwise operators accessed through logical operators in FAR #66703
    Area-IDE, Next
  • ⚡️Share AssemblyloadTestFixture on Framework #66684
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Don't overwrite binary logs in CI #66683
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add FAR support for finding 'Add' methods used in collection initializers. #66700
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic snippets - `propg` and `propi` snippets #65979
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix formatting issue with convert-to-full-prop #66686
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers, DemoContent
  • Revert "Record added node output states as new" #66696
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Avoid directory enumerations in DeleteLeftoverDirectories #66656
    Area-Analyzers, Next

Updated

  • Add some EE and EnC tests for primary constructors #66677
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Convert language-specific option types to records #66633
    Area-IDE
  • Track MemberNotNull for local functions #63310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix XmlDocumentationProvider to return the entire XML node #66668
    Area-IDE
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Update CSharpErrorFactsGenerator to be a source generator #65192
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure generated trees have a full path #60095
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Obsolete `ISourceGenerator` APIs #66462
    Area-Compilers
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use `SourceText` indexer when parsing #61662
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Improve performance of StringText.Write & StringBuilderText.Write on .NET Core #61167
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove CS1701 and CS1702 warnings #66313
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • List patterns: Avoid generating arbitrarily long pattern examples #66585
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle captured primary constructor parameters in readonly context. #66685
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix SuppressMessage not working on lambdas #62970
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review
  • [17.5] Add `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` #66636
    Area-Compilers
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.5
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VSCode Blazor Wasm Extension - "DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED" #46445
  • Request for information on how to retrieve the cipher suite of a connection in .NET Core #46442
  • Perf regression: https #46441
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #46440
  • System.ArgumentException: 'overlapped' was not allocated by this ThreadPoolBoundHandle instance. #46439
  • Describe Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UserOptions.RequireUniqueMail behaviour in documentation comments #46435
  • ANCM Out-Of-Process random port range causes collision #46431
  • Blazor Playwright Tests StaticFiles Dependency #46430
  • "ENOENT: no such file or directory" on VS Code Blazor Debug #46429
  • AddRoutingCore(this IServiceCollection services) and RouteOptions updates for CreateSlimBuilder #46428
  • Utilize .NET SDK workloads infrastructure to generate runtime pack msis for Visual Studio #46427

Closed

  • [Question] How to set minimal API OpenApi validation info without DataAnnotations? #46286
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce IResettable to streamline object pool usage #44901
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: https, updates #46376
  • Perf regression: mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #46378
  • ConfigurationBuilder not support record type #46345
  • [Blazor] Remove CustomElements package and samples from asplabs #46127
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Question: UnsupportedApiVersionStatusCode with MediaType-based versioning. #46433
  • Files not found/ failed integrity check when deploying Hosted Blazor WASM app to IIS Express #46410
  • WebApplicationFactory CreateClient throws DirectoryNotFound if solution and project in same directory #45717
    .NET 8 Planning
  • my application could not run backgroud on ubuntu. #45858
  • Support response writing in RequestDelegateGenerator #46276
    8.0-preview2
  • Generate route handler-endpoints at compile time via source generator #45524
    8.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary code from F# templates #46443
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Use JSImport for lazy loading assemblies #46437
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Continuation of PR 40097 (Input components should use SetUpdatesAttributeName) #46434
    area-blazor
  • Bump up the MIN_PORT for ANCM out of process #46432
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Delete Interop.FunctionalTests.ChromeTests #46425
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Introduce the IResettable type. #46426
    8.0-preview2
  • Add support for response writing to RequestDelegateGenerator #46291
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime
  • Bump http-cache-semantics from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 in /src/Components/test/E2ETest #46409
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-alpha.1.23077.6` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add initial parameter support to RequestDelegateGenerator #46407
    area-web-frameworks
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet trace --format speedscope does not contain an All Threads item #3493
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [Tizen] Handle exception in System.Console.SetCursorPosition in some environments #3635

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hard crash when loading ContentPage with a ContentView in Dynamically loaded DLL #13112
  • [Android]Popup window position not update based on keyboard appearance in .NET 7 #13109
  • VisualState "Pressed" not supported on a "Border" control #13108
  • Padding on ImageButtons works wrong on Android #13101
    Backlog
  • [Android][iOS] CollectionView.CanReorderItems does not work #13100
    Backlog

Closed

  • Button only displays first line of multiline text #9949
    Backlog
  • Button ContentLayout iOS ignores spacing and aligns to edge of button #8467
  • 20x performance hit on Mac #13097
  • Date format DatePicker wrong in Windows #9255
    Backlog
  • BackButtonBehavior IconOverride does not work on Windows #13107
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'You cannot start a load for a destroyed activity' #13105
  • [Bug] MPNowPlayingInfoCenter.default.playbackState not mapped #2429
    Backlog
  • Create code tour of handler architecture #1109
    Backlog
  • HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates.Add() do nothing on macOS #13102
  • Implementation error in settings manager with .NET MAUI #13085
  • [Bug] Grid doesn't appear to be consistently constraining #2933
    Backlog
  • 'Unable to activate windows store app {id}. The activation request failed with error code "The parameter is incorrect"' #9324
  • Deployment Fails if Maui Class Library is referenced #9564
    .NET 8 Planning

  • [iOS] Fix crash with a hidden CarouselView #13083
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove PhoneDialer.Default #13079
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞

  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025

  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PreProcess query BEFORE extracting query parameters #30208
  • Runtime for migration bundle creation in Net7 #30207
  • Sql Server, using OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.SetNull) on parent entity, where child have a trigger should not use OUTPUT #30206
  • Owned types with composite primary keys that include the foreign key fail on searches #30205
  • Add-Migration EFCore tool generates NRE for specific IEntityTypeConfiguration<T> implementing type name #30203

Closed

  • Map part of the entity to Json column without the need of Owned entity container. #30094
  • .NET 7 regression: Deletion can cause error "The association between entity types A and B has been severed etc." #30122
    8.0.0
  • SetPropertyCalls<TSource> need a method #30202

PullRequests

Merged

  • Prevent re-entrance into DetectChanges #30204
  • Update Cosmos tests log location #30154

Updated

  • Open connection in tests if needed #30171
  • Use precision/scale facets instead of store type when reverse engineering #30049
    waiting-for-response
  • issue #29710 #30167
  • Remove unchecks in SQL Server type mappings #30164

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 preview 1 SDK installed, Error "NU3004: The package is not signed." happens when installing workloads. #15416

PullRequests

Created

  • Split the VMR Build into a separate pipeline #15419
    Area-SourceBuild

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2104089 #15354

Updated

  • Remove source-build manipulation of stable version. #15121
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Update source-build artifacts to be coherent #15372
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Split VMR synchronization for public & internal branches #15409
    Area-SourceBuild
